itemDisplayName: Create a Three VM Skype for Business Deployment
description: This template creates three new Azure VMs, each with a public IP address and load balancer and a VNet, it configures one VM to be an AD DC for a new Forest and Domain, one with SQL Server domain joined and a third VM with a Skpye for Business Enterprise Pool, all VMs have public facing RDP
summary: This template creates a Skype for Business pool
